bios: Melina is a software engineer in the San Francisco Bay Area. She earned her Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Computer Science from the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor.
She is a former long-time Web Systems instructor and has multiple software engineering internship experiences.

She is passionate about web development, teaching and education, supporting women in STEM, and perpetual learning. In her free time, she enjoys playing music, listening to tech podcasts, and learning about Emacs.
